alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:28PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL STILLWATER AND CENTRAL SWEET GRASS COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Big Timber, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Timber and Greycliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass
